I've finished adding a fully independent, KZG / EIP-4844 implementation in Constantine:

- https://github.com/mratsim/constantine/blob/7b64f85/constantine/ethereum_eip4844_kzg_polynomial_commitments.nim

It passes all the (big-endian v1.4.0-beta) test vectors.

Next step is adding parallelization and a C API (and Rust and Go).
